Earvin Effay "Magic" Johnson

Photos

345

123

22

Sport:

basketball

Organizations:

Hawaii Community College

American professional basketball player. Throughout his career, he played for the Los Angeles Lakers Club (1979–91, 1996) as a point guard. In 1979, he won the national championship. Then the athlete played for the University of Michigan national team. Then the basketball player joined the Los Angeles Lakers. With this team, Johnson won five championships at the National Basketball Association: 1980, 1982, 1985, 1987–88. Dear team player and leader, has been named the most valuable player three times.
